text: Oberthal is a municipality in the district of Sankt Wendel in the state of Saarland, Germany. It is about northwest of Sankt Wendel, and north of Saarbrücken. The Oberthal municipality exists of four settlements (people in brackets, as of 2012) * Gronig (1,442) * Güdesweiler (1,350) * Oberthal (2,872) * Steinberg-Deckenhardt (787) ==References== ==Other websites==
title: Oberthal, Saarland
